info.title: AI Model Training
info.description: Backend API for AI Model Training Operations

get.description: Test endpoint without any authentication - should work without auth.

post.description:
Authenticate user with Google OAuth 2.0 token.

Flow:
1. Verify Google token
2. Validate email domain
3. Get or create user
4. Generate JWT tokens

Args:
    request: Google OAuth token
    db: Database session
    auth_service: Auth service
    
Returns:
    JWT access and refresh tokens with user info

Refresh JWT access token using refresh token.

Args:
    request: Refresh token
    db: Database session
    auth_service: Auth service
    
Returns:
    New access and refresh tokens

get.description:
Get current authenticated user information.

Args:
    current_user: Current user from dependency
    
Returns:
    User information

post.description:
Create a new training execution and optionally start it.

Args:
    data: Training execution data
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_service: Training service
    
Returns:
    Created training execution

Start an existing training execution.

Args:
    training_execution_id: Training execution ID
    force_restart: Force restart if already running
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_service: Training service
    
Returns:
    Success message

schema.title: Response Start Training Training Start  Training Execution Id  Post

get.description:
Get training execution details by ID.

Args:
    training_execution_id: Training execution ID
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_service: Training service
    
Returns:
    Training execution details

delete.description:
Delete a training execution.

Args:
    training_execution_id: Training execution ID
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_service: Training service
    
Returns:
    Success message

schema.title: Response Delete Training Execution Training  Training Execution Id  Delete

get.description:
List training executions with filters and pagination.

Args:
    status_filter: Filter by status
    tenant_id: Filter by tenant_id
    page: Page number
    page_size: Items per page
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_service: Training service
    
Returns:
    Paginated list of training executions

post.description:
Abort a running training execution.

Args:
    data: Abort request with training ID and reason
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_service: Training service
    
Returns:
    Success message

schema.title: Response Abort Training Training Abort Post

get.description:
Get all tenant IDs and mappings from Snowflake US region.

Args:
    sf_service_us_infra: Snowflake service (US infra region)
    current_user: UserModel a

Returns:
    List of tenant mappings with tenant_id, tenant_name, and cells

schema.title: Response Get Tenant Ids Mapping Training Data Tenant Ids Mapping Get

get.description:
Get workflow IDs and names for a specific tenant.

Args:
    tenant_id: Tenant ID
    sf_service: Snowflake service
    current_user: Current authenticated user

Returns:
    List of workflows with workflow_id and workflow_name

schema.title: Response Get Tenant Workflow Ids Training Data Tenant  Tenant Id  Workflow Ids Get

get.description:
Get all TRTLLM model artifacts.

Args:
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    List of TRTLLM model artifacts

schema.title: Response Get All Trtllm Models Training Data Trtllm Models Get

post.description:
Manually fetch data from Snowflake based on filters.
Data is cached for preview and later saving.

Args:
    request: Fetch request with Snowflake filters
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    training_data_service: Training data preparation service
    
Returns:
    Fetch response with preview and cache ID

Save previously fetched data to S3 and create TrainingDataPreparation record.

Args:
    request: Save request with fetch ID and metadata
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_data_service: Training data preparation service
    
Returns:
    Created training data preparation info

Apply preprocessing methods to training data.

Args:
    request: Process request with methods list
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_data_service: Training data preparation service
    
Returns:
    Processing status
    
Note: This is a stub implementation. Actual preprocessing should be
implemented based on specific requirements.

Prepare data by splitting into train/test/val sets.

Args:
    request: Prepare request with split configuration
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_data_service: Training data preparation service
    
Returns:
    Prepare response with file IDs and S3 paths
    
Note: This is a stub implementation. Actual split logic should be
implemented based on data size and requirements.

get.description:
Get training data preparation details by ID.

Args:
    training_data_preparation_id: Preparation ID
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_data_service: Training data preparation service
    
Returns:
    Training data preparation details

delete.description:
Delete a training data preparation.

Args:
    training_data_preparation_id: Preparation ID
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_data_service: Training data preparation service
    
Returns:
    Success message

schema.title: Response Delete Training Data Preparation Training Data  Training Data Preparation Id  Delete

get.description:
List training data preparations with filters and pagination.

Args:
    customer_name: Filter by customer name
    page: Page number
    page_size: Items per page
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    training_data_service: Training data preparation service
    
Returns:
    Paginated list of training data preparations

Get all model artifacts with their training execution details.

Args:
    db: Database session
    service: Model artifact service
    
Returns:
    List of all model artifacts with training execution names

schema.title: Response Get All Model Artifacts Model Artifacts  Get

get.description:
Get a specific model artifact by ID with training execution details.

Args:
    artifact_id: Model artifact UUID
    db: Database session
    service: Model artifact service
    
Returns:
    Model artifact with training execution name

Get all model artifacts of a specific type with training execution details.

Args:
    artifact_type: Type of artifact (TRTLLM or RAW_WEIGHT) as query parameter
    db: Database session
    service: Model artifact service
    
Returns:
    List of model artifacts of the specified type with training execution names

schema.title: Response Get Model Artifacts By Type Model Artifacts By Type Get
